content.rendered: PERSONALIZED LEARNING: Recommendations align to your child’s interests, pace and learning level. Customized to help your child master the skills they need and gain confidence along the way. PRE-K GRADE LEVEL SKILLS: Matching & sorting, word sounds, tracing, color sense, shape recognition & more. Our active learning approach helps kids master foundational concepts.
